## Type of Change

<!-- Mark the relevant option with an 'x' -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Test additions/updates
- [ ] Chore (maintenance, dependencies, etc.)

## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] All tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] No linting errors (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] TypeScript compiles successfully (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Test coverage >= 85% (`npm run test:coverage`)
- [ ] Code follows project conventions (see [CONTRIBUTING.md](../docs/CONTRIBUTING.md))

### Testing

- [ ] Added tests for new functionality
- [ ] Updated existing tests if needed
- [ ] All tests are passing
- [ ] Edge cases are covered

### Documentation

- [ ] Updated README.md with examples (if applicable)
- [ ] Updated JSDoc comments
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] Verified API compliance with Firecrawl (if applicable)
- [ ] Updated docs/API_VERIFICATION.md (if applicable)
- [ ] Updated docs/PROJECT_STATUS.md (if applicable)

### API Compliance

- [ ] Verified against Meta's WhatsApp API documentation
- [ ] Field names match Meta docs exactly
- [ ] Limits/constraints enforced
- [ ] Response structure matches docs
- [ ] Documented verification in API_VERIFICATION.md

### Commit Messages

- [ ] Follows Conventional Commits format
  - `feat:` for new features
  - `fix:` for bug fixes
  - `docs:` for documentation
  - `test:` for tests
  - `refactor:` for refactoring
  - `chore:` for maintenance
